week_2026_04_01.title: Best Ball
week_2026_04_01.description: Two-man best ball. Each player plays their own ball. The team score is the lowest individual score on each hole.

week_2026_04_08.title: Shamble
week_2026_04_08.description: All players tee off. The team selects the best drive, then each plays their own ball into the hole. Lowest individual score counts.

week_2026_04_15.title: Scramble
week_2026_04_15.description: All players tee off. The team selects the best shot and all players hit from that spot until the ball is holed. One team score per hole.

week_2026_04_22.title: Best Ball
week_2026_04_22.description: Two-man best ball. Each player plays their own ball. The team score is the lowest individual score on each hole.

week_2026_04_29.title: Scramble
week_2026_04_29.description: All players tee off; the team selects the best shot and all players hit from that location. Repeat until holed.

week_2026_05_06.title: Shamble
week_2026_05_06.description: All players tee off; take the best drive, then each plays their own ball until holed. Lowest individual score counts.

week_2026_05_13.title: Modified Stableford
week_2026_05_13.description: Players earn points based on score vs. par. Highest point total wins.

week_2026_05_20.title: Alternate Shot
week_2026_05_20.description: Players alternate shots using one ball. One tees off on odd holes, the other on even holes.

week_2026_05_27.title: Chapman
week_2026_05_27.description: Both golfers tee off. Switch balls for second shots. Select the better ball, then alternate until holed.

week_2026_06_03.title: Quota
week_2026_06_03.description: Players earn points based on their score relative to par. Goal is to exceed your assigned quota.

week_2026_06_10.title: Two-Man Combined Score
week_2026_06_10.description: Both players play their own ball; the team score is the sum of the two individual scores.
